list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sound made by something striking or falling into liquid.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we hit the water with a mighty splash
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi chạm nước với một giật gân mạnh mẽ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause (liquid) to strike or fall on something in irregular drops.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she splashed cold water onto her face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô văng nước lạnh vào mặt cô.
